title: HoP 341 - True Romance - Theories of Love
itunes:title: HoP 341 - True Romance - Theories of Love
description: Ficino describes a “Platonic” love purified of sexuality, prompting a debate carried on by Pico della Mirandola, Pietro Bembo, and Tullia d’Aragona.
